parameters.name: CategoryId
parameters.description:
The type of the service. This parameter is empty by default. Valid values:

*   **All**: all services
*   **RiskDomain**: risky domain names
*   **RiskIP**: risky IP addresses
*   **AliYun**: Alibaba Cloud services
*   **NotAliYun**: third-party services

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain name in outbound connections.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the query results. Valid values:

*   **asc**: the ascending order.
*   **desc**: the descending order. This is the default value.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Default value: 6. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: PublicIP
parameters.description: The public IP address of the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance that initiates outbound connections.

parameters.name: Sort
parameters.description:
The field based on which you want to sort the query results. Valid values:

*   **SessionCount**: the number of requests. This is the default value.
*   **TotalBytes**: the total volume of traffic.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: TagIdNew
parameters.description:
The ID of the tag. Valid values:

*   **AliYun**: Alibaba Cloud service
*   **RiskDomain**: risky domain name
*   **RiskIP**: risky IP address
*   **TrustedDomain**: trusted website
*   **AliPay**: Alipay
*   **DingDing**: DingTalk
*   **WeChat**: WeChat
*   **QQ**: Tencent QQ
*   **SecurityService**: security service
*   **Microsoft**: Microsoft
*   **Amazon**: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
*   **Pan**: cloud disk
*   **Map**: map
*   **Code**: code hosting
*   **SystemService**: system service
*   **Taobao**: Taobao
*   **Google**: Google
*   **ThirdPartyService**: third-party service
*   **FirstFlow**: the first time when an outbound connection is initiated
*   **Downloader**: malicious download
*   **Alexa Top1M**: popular website
*   **Miner**: mining pool
*   **Intelligence**: threat intelligence
*   **DDoS**: DDoS trojan
*   **Ransomware**: ransomware
*   **Spyware**: spyware
*   **Rogue**: rogue software
*   **Botnet**: botnet
*   **Suspicious**: suspicious website
*   **C\&C**: command and control (C\&C)
*   **Gang**: gang
*   **CVE**: Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE)
*   **Backdoor**: webshell
*   **Phishing**: phishing website
*   **APT**: advanced persistent threat (APT) attack
*   **Supply Chain Attack**: supply chain attack
*   **Malicious software**: malware
